ContentType.Name: FancyTilesItem
ContentType.Description: Fancy Tiles Item Custom Content Type. Contains all the columns used for a tile item.

FieldRef.Description: Keyword used to specify what tiles should be shown in the web part.
FieldRef.Name: GroupKeyword

FieldRef.Description: URL that points to the tile image.
FieldRef.Name: ImageLink

FieldRef.Description: Click destination of the tile. If left blank, tile will not have a click action.
FieldRef.Name: TileClickLink

FieldRef.Description: The color of the tile title.
FieldRef.Name: TitleColor

FieldRef.Description: The color that will be shown behind the tile title. Shown with an opacity of 75 percent.
FieldRef.Name: TitleColorBackground

FieldRef.Description: Text shown on tile when user hovers on the tile.
FieldRef.Name: HoverText

FieldRef.Description: Direction from which text will appear when user hovers on tile. None means no text will show when user hovers over the tile.
FieldRef.Name: HoverTextDirection

FieldRef.Description: The color of the hover text.
FieldRef.Name: HoverTextColor

FieldRef.Description: The color that will be shown behind the hover text.
FieldRef.Name: HoverColorBackground

FieldRef.Description: Order in which tiles should appear. When left blank, items will default to order in which items are created. A tile with a blank Tile Order field will show before any items with numbers in this field.
FieldRef.Name: TileOrder
